rules_text:
Improve {1}{W} [i]({1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to attacking embattled creatures you control. [i](A creature is embattled if it has a counter on it or has a permanent you control attached to it.)[/i]
